```{r}
#load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
```

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
# Cleaning column names
gom4 <- read_excel("~/NOAA Work/Gulf of Mexico/GOMECC-4/GOMECC-4_versionJan2024.xlsx") %>% 
  slice(-1) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(date = dmy(str_glue("{day_utc}, {month_utc}, {year_utc}"))) %>%
  rename(stnnbr = station_id, ctdprs = ctdpres, ctdsal = ctdsal_pss78, ctdtmp = ctdtmp_its90) %>% 
  filter(oxygen > 0 | ctdoxy > 0) %>% 
  filter(oxygen_flag == 1 | oxygen_flag == 2 | oxygen_flag == 6) %>% 
  mutate(oxygen = if_else(oxygen < 0, NA, oxygen)) %>% 
  mutate(ctdoxy = if_else(ctdoxy < 0, NA, ctdoxy)) %>%
  select(stnnbr, oxygen, ctdoxy, latitude, longitude, ctdtmp, ctdsal, ctdprs, date) %>% 
  mutate(cruise = rep("GOMECC4", n())) %>%
  mutate(across(1:8, as.numeric)) 

write_csv(gom4, "~/NOAA Work/Gulf of Mexico/GOMECC-4/GOMECC-4-CLEAN.csv")
```

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
gom4 %>% 
  group_by(latitude, longitude) %>% 
  count(n())
```

```{r}
prof1 <- gom4 %>% 
  filter(latitude == 25.002, longitude == -87.995) 
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_smooth(data = prof1, aes(x = ctdoxy, y = ctdprs), orientation = "y", color = "red") +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  xlim(0, 300) + 
  labs(y = "depth (m)", x = "oxygen (umol/kg)")
```                                                                 

```{r}
prof1 %>%
    mutate(oxychange = abs(ctdoxy - lag(ctdoxy, n = 1))) %>% 
    mutate(depthchange = abs(ctdprs - lag(ctdprs, n = 1))) %>% 
    mutate(ROC = round(oxychange/depthchange, 3)) %>% 
    select(ctdprs, ROC, ctdoxy) %>% 
    arrange(desc(ctdprs))
```
